pr_title: Add specific test for serializing all mapping parameter values

timeline.message: Add specific test for serializing all mapping parameter values

timeline.bodyText: Could you assumeFalse here so it logs as skipped? I don't think that makes a big difference in the long run, but it makes me feel a little better about doing nothing in a test.
timeline.author: nik9000

timeline.message: use assumeFalse; allow scaled_float null_value to be null
